verses.verse: But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> you, O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> you, O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> you, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name;<s%> you are mine.

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> I will be with you; and through the <S%H5103>rivers,<s%> they shall not <S%H7857>overflow<s%> you: <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H1119>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you shall not be <S%H3554>burned;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H1197>kindle<s%> on you.

For I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H3467>Savior:<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your <S%H3724>ransom,<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> for you.

Since you were <S%H3365>precious<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> you have been <S%H3513>honorable,<s%> and I have <S%H157>loved<s%> you: therefore will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> for you, and <S%H3816>people<s%> for your <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for I am with you: I will <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H4628>west;<s%>

I will <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> up; and to the <S%H8486>south,<s%> <S%H3607>Keep<s%> not <S%H3607>back:<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Even <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name:<s%> for I have <S%H1254>created<s%> him for my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> him; <S%H637>yes,<s%> I have <S%H6213>made<s%> him.
<S%H3318>Bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> that have <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and let the <S%H3816>people<s%> be <S%H622>assembled:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> among them can <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and <S%H8085>show<s%> us <S%H7223>former<s%> things? let them <S%H5414>bring<s%> forth their <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> that they may be <S%H6663>justified:<s%> or let them <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> It is <S%H571>truth.<s%>

You are my <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen:<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H539>believe<s%> me, and <S%H995>understand<s%> that I am he: <S%H6440>before<s%> me there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H310>after<s%> me.
I, even I, am the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H1107>beside<s%> me there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3467>savior.<s%>

I have <S%H5046>declared,<s%> and have <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and I have <S%H8085>showed,<s%> when there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> god among you: therefore you are my <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I am <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> before the <S%H3117>day<s%> was I am he; and there is <S%H369>none<s%> that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand:<s%> I will <S%H6466>work,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7725>let<s%> it?

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> your <S%H1350>redeemer,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> For your <S%H4616>sake<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and have <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1281>nobles,<s%> and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> whose <S%H7440>cry<s%> is in the <S%H591>ships.<s%>
I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> your <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One, the <S%H1254>creator<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H4428>King.<s%>
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H5414>makes<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and a <S%H5410>path<s%> in the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>

Which <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H4161>forth<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horse,<s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> and the <S%H5808>power;<s%> they shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> they shall not <S%H6965>rise:<s%> they are <S%H1846>extinct,<s%> they are <S%H3518>quenched<s%> as <S%H6594>wick.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> you not the <S%H7223>former<s%> things, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> the things of <S%H6931>old.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> thing; <S%H6258>now<s%> it shall <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth;<s%> shall you not <S%H3045>know<s%> it? I will <S%H637>even<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5103>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>

The <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3513>honor<s%> me, the <S%H8577>dragons<s%> and the <S%H1323>owls:<s%> <S%H3284><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5103>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert,<s%> to give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to my <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H972>chosen.<s%>
<S%H2098>This<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have I <S%H3335>formed<s%> for myself; they shall <S%H5608>show<s%> forth my <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
But you have not <S%H7121>called<s%> on me, O <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> but you have been <S%H3021>weary<s%> of me, O <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You have not <S%H935>brought<s%> me the small <S%H7716>cattle<s%> of your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings; <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H3513>honored<s%> me with your <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%> I have not caused you to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3021>wearied<s%> you with <S%H3828>incense.<s%>

You have <S%H7069>bought<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> sweet <S%H7070>cane<s%> with <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H7301>filled<s%> me with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices:<s%> but you have <S%H6213>made<s%> me to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with your <S%H2403>sins,<s%> you have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> me with your <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
I, even I, am he that <S%H4229>blots<s%> out your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> for my own <S%H4616>sake,<s%> and will not <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
Put me in <S%H2142>remembrance:<s%> let us <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> <S%H5608>declare<s%> you, that you may be <S%H6663>justified.<s%>
Your <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and your <S%H3887>teachers<s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me.

Therefore I have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to the <S%H2764>curse,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1421>reproaches.<s%>
